Class BroomPartRegistry

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.broom.BroomPartRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry, IBroomPartRegistry
public class BroomPartRegistry extends Object implements IBroomPartRegistry
Default registry for broom parts.
